1524920.name: ThroughHelltoHeaven
1524920.description:
Confronted with a reality of eternal damnation, from the jail cell she sleeps Amy’s soul is plunged into Hell forcing her to survive, and search for answers in a place of torment and agony. Survive encounters with sinister demons while lost in the hollow grotto of Hell. Reclaim the shards of your soul in order to explore the captivating open world of Heaven.

Help Amy, our protagonist survive the torment and suffering of Hell while trying to replace the missing pieces of her soul. Can you help Amy redeem her soul and find her ultimate peace in Heaven? Experience Psychological Horror and the visual immersions in this first-person survival game.

In order to ascend to Heaven, you must help Amy navigate her way through Hell using Stealth, Running, or even Hiding to escape the Vile Demons. Once Her soul is complete, you will Venture back to the Entrance of Hell to enter the Portal of Heaven.
1524920.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
